title: Editorial | First humanoid robot games are proof the future is already here
description: From automation to athletics, the merging of artificial intelligence with robotics holds great promise, and peril.
content: Babies are clumsy – and so are humanoid robots. That may be why so many of us were amused watching videos of the non-human competitors at the inaugural World Humanoid Robot Games in Beijing, and found them cute. While many managed to perform adequate... [1551 chars]

title: AI Is a Mirror in Which We See Our Own Reflection
description: Delve into the relationship between humans and Artificial Intelligence (AI) and the reflections of ourselves we may not want to see.
content:
AI is not so much a tool that everyone uses in more or less the same way, but a mirror in which we see our own reflection–if we care to look.
